snippet: The Lede is following the intensified debate on gun violence in the wake of the shootings in Newtown, Conn., with reports from our correspondents and from around the Web
abstract: The Lede is following the intensified debate on gun violence in the wake of the shootings in Newtown, Conn., with reports from our correspondents and from around the Web

headline.main: Jan. 10 Updates on the Gun Violence Debate
